Articles.Content:
There was a mod I found a long time ago with alternate science JR and goo experiments; the goo was basically a canister that extended out from the ship, and the Science JR was a flat panel that slid open. I can't find them any more though; does anyone know where they were?

Edited October 13, 2014 by Tassyr

I think you're talking about Panda Jager Laboratories.

Problem is, it's old and I have not been able to find it on either Curse or Kerbalstuff. The good news: I still have it and despite being old it still works.

If this is the mod you're looking for contact me through PM and I can mail it to you. It's only 773kB

Edit: Never mind me offering to mail it to you. I just noticed there is an alternate download link on the last page.
You're awesome- I've been looking for those parts for days! Thanks so much!
